description:
Input state contract for the stamper node (node-local).

This model defines the input parameters required for stamper node execution.
All fields are validated according to the current schema version.

Fields:
    version: Schema version for input state (must match current schema version)
    file_path: Path to the file to be stamped (required)
    author: Name or identifier of the user or process requesting the stamp
    correlation_id: Optional correlation ID for request tracking and telemetry
    discover_functions: Whether to discover and include function tools in metadata

access_token.description: Optional access token for authentication (sensitive field)
access_token.title: Access Token

api_key.description: Optional API key for authenticated operations (sensitive field)
api_key.title: Api Key

author.description: Name or identifier of the user or process requesting the stamp
author.title: Author

correlation_id.description: Optional correlation ID for request tracking and telemetry
correlation_id.title: Correlation Id

discover_functions.description: Whether to discover and include function tools in metadata (unified tools approach)
discover_functions.title: Discover Functions

file_path.description: Path to the file to be stamped
file_path.title: File Path

version.description: Schema version for input state (must be compatible with current schema)
version.title: Version

title: StamperInputState
